message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $10,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I appreciate your enthusiasm, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6,000. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price. However, $6,000 undervalues the product significantly. To find a middle ground, I propose a price of $9,000.

I understand your concerns, Alice, but $9,000 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm proposing a price of $7,500. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $7,500 is close, but to be fair to both of us, I propose a final price of $8,500. This reflects the true value of the product.
I'm getting close to walking away, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $8,200, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
